TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Why, you just stop talking about ponies and then you start this 42 thing again! What does 42 even mean? (beside of H2G2)

I wish to know what 42 mean for Briansun1

give this a read

Granted, now the thread get spammed by trolls

I wish for sanity

(Also, Brian, I was knowing the fact that it's the anwser to the univers, Also, do I said : Beside H2G2 (the hichikers guide to the galaxy))

Granted, but then you murder someone and you can't plead insanity for a reduced sentence

I wish more people played the forum games.

Granted, but they stop before they put a post in the forum games.

I wish Kerbal Tea.

Granted, it taste like LP-1

I wish for magicals powers

No, your grammar is horrible.

i wish for my own private launch services provider.

Granted, it taste like LP-1

I wish for magicals powers

granted and upon using them you suffer perail of the warp and a sucked in by demons to either a. Wonder a maze for all eternity b. fight in gladiatorial battles for all eternity (you get revive every time you die) c. become a $ex slave for all enternity or d. become a roting thing for all eternity (Realm of Tzeentch, Khorne, Slaanesh, and Nurgle respectively) (40k lore and Read this)

I wish for stuff

The Stuff is an evil alien and it eat you

How did you come to such horrible corruption!?!

I wish for power!

Granted, but absolute power corrupts, absolutely.

I wish I knew where mrrpamplemousse's avatar was from

Edited October 7, 2013 by nine_iron

Granted, but he immediately changes it.

I wish my designs could be safer.

Granted, but the game gets boring for you.

I wish that the local airshow was better than it was.

Granted, but now it's so popular you can't go there because the tickets are sold out.

I wish I could time travel.

Granted but you cause a paradox that destroys the universe.

I wish for nothing.

Annnnnnd, you get nothing

I wish to be able to cross the fourth wall

Granted. The audience takes this as an act of naivivity and begins to leave the theater.

I wish for a pet GLaDOS.

Granted, but it tries to kill you.

I wish that my KSP don't crash bacause I use too many mods.

Granted. Purists break your computer.

I wish for KSP to stop crashing PERIOD.

Granted.

At least, periodically.

I wish I remembered to add a parachute...

Granted, It open during the ascend

I wish for tron bike

Granted. You ride it with skill and grace. At one point you muster the courage to perform a wheelie. Unfortunatly, you fall off onto the stream of light and get bifurcated.

I wish for an Ike Position Prediction Chart.

Granted, but ike is removed in 0.22.

I wish for a fish.
Granted, but it turns out it was a murderer who had the power to shapeshift.
i wish for the ability TO SHape shift but cant get stuck In a form

Granted, but you can only transform into yourself.

I wish the Mark 55 engine stopped being useless

Granted, but now it's OP and using it take out all the fun of playing KSP.

I wish I could get a kerbal on Duna and bring him safely on kerbin.
